WELCOME.TITLE: Welcome to Angular Internationalization
WELCOME.SUBTITLE: Learn how to create multi-language applications with Angular
WELCOME.DESCRIPTION: This demo shows different approaches to internationalization in Angular applications, including built-in i18n and ngx-translate.

FEATURES.TITLE: Features demonstrated in this application:
FEATURES.FORMATS: Custom format examples for different locales

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Product Catalog
PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: Browse our selection of products with localized prices and descriptions.

DATES.TITLE: Date Formatting Examples
DATES.DESCRIPTION: See how dates are formatted differently based on your selected locale.

NUMBERS.TITLE: Number Formatting Examples
NUMBERS.DESCRIPTION: See how numbers, currencies and percentages are formatted differently based on your selected locale.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Fill out the form below to send us a message.
CONTACT.NAME: Name
CONTACT.SUBJECT: Subject
CONTACT.AGREE_TERMS: I agree to the terms and conditions
CONTACT.SUBMISSION_SUCCESS: Thank you! Your message has been submitted successfully.

PROFILE.TITLE: User Profile
PROFILE.DESCRIPTION: View and manage your profile information.
PROFILE.LOCALE_SAVED: Your language preference will be saved for future visits
